title: Pithecanthropus
description: Either you are using this tool on a wrong text or this was written by that stupid guy that was offending you at High school

title: Younger sister
description: Looks like what is written here makes sense, but unless the author is your close friend or relative you won't find this reading esthetically pleasing

title: Pragmatic writer
description: Written either by a lazy person or just the one that values essence over the form

title: Neat essayist
description: Written either by a well-educated gentleman or lady

title: Beyond Good and Evil
description: What is written here was forged by a tormented soul of a grammar Nazi with graphomania in a terminal stage. If the author is not Irish whose name consists of five or more words or/ else he doesn't want his son to end up with schizophrenia he'd better stop and reevaluate his life decisions.
